helpItems.title: Zoom Controls
helpItems.content: Use these controls to zoom in and out of your design space, making it easier to work with complex architectures.

helpItems.title: Undo/Redo
helpItems.content: Use these buttons to undo or redo your recent actions, making it easy to correct mistakes or try different approaches.

helpItems.title: Run Button
helpItems.content: Sends your architecture to the compiler to generate a runnable implementation. Results will be available in the Call Graph and Run Chart tabs.

helpItems.title: Buffer Tool
helpItems.content: Creates buffer regions that can store and forward data between components in your architecture.

helpItems.title: Bus Tool
helpItems.content: Creates bus regions that act as communication channels between components, allowing data to be transferred across your architecture.

helpItems.title: Factory Tool
helpItems.content: Creates factory regions that represent processing units in your architecture, capable of transforming or manipulating data.

helpItems.title: Bellstate Tool
helpItems.content: Creates bellstate regions that represent conditional state transitions in your graph architecture.

helpItems.title: Register Tool
helpItems.content: Creates register regions that can store persistent values in your architecture.

helpItems.title: Tool Items
helpItems.content: Collection of tools that can be selected to create different types of architecture components.

helpItems.title: Selector Tool
helpItems.content: Use this tool to select and interact with existing regions in your architecture.

helpItems.title: Unselect Tool
helpItems.content: Use this tool to clear the current selection and remove highlighted regions.

helpItems.title: Pan Tool
helpItems.content: Use this tool to move around your design space by dragging the canvas.

helpItems.title: Tool Options
helpItems.content: Configure options for the currently selected tool, such as subtypes and specific parameters.

helpItems.title: Tool Options Content
helpItems.content: Container for the options and settings related to the currently selected tool.

helpItems.title: Paint Mode
helpItems.content: Enables continuous drawing mode where you can click and drag to create multiple regions at once.

helpItems.title: Region Type Selection
helpItems.content: Select the specific subtype of region you want to create with the currently selected tool.

helpItems.title: Region Subtype Dropdown
helpItems.content: Choose from available subtypes for the current region kind (buffer, bus, factory, etc.).

helpItems.title: Region Panel
helpItems.content: This panel displays and manages the regions in your architecture.

helpItems.title: Region List
helpItems.content: Displays all regions in your architecture. Select a region to view and edit its properties.

helpItems.title: Region Settings
helpItems.content: Configure properties for the selected region, including its connections to other regions.

helpItems.title: Error List
helpItems.content: Displays any errors or warnings in your architecture design.

helpItems.title: Save Button
helpItems.content: Saves your current architecture design to a file on your computer.

helpItems.title: Load Button
helpItems.content: Loads an architecture design from a file on your computer.

helpItems.title: New Project Button
helpItems.content: Creates a new architecture project, clearing the current design.

helpItems.title: Settings Button
helpItems.content: Opens the project settings dialog where you can adjust properties like size and description.

helpItems.title: Help Button
helpItems.content: Shows this help overlay with information about the different components and tools.

helpItems.title: Reconnect Button
helpItems.content: Reconnects to the backend service if the connection was lost or interrupted.
